Column {data-width=650}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Chart A

```{r}
set.seed(1)

data("instacart")

insta <- instacart %>% 
  select(-eval_set) %>% 
sample_n(5000)

bar_insta <- insta %>% 
  group_by(aisle) %>% 
  summarize(n_aisle = n()) %>% 
  arrange(desc(n_aisle)) %>% 
  top_n(15) %>% 
  mutate(aisle = fct_reorder(aisle, n_aisle)) %>% 
  plot_ly(x = ~aisle, y = ~n_aisle, type = 'bar', color = ~aisle)

ggplotly(bar_insta)


```

Column {data-width=350}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Chart B

```{r}

line_insta <- insta %>% 
  group_by(order_hour_of_day) %>% 
  summarize(n_order = n()) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = order_hour_of_day, y = n_order)) +
  geom_line() +
  labs(
    title = 'Number of orders change by time in 24 hours',
    x = 'Time',
    y = 'Number of orders'
  ) +
  theme_bw()

ggplotly(line_insta)


```

### Chart C

```{r}

insta %>% 
  group_by(aisle, order_dow) %>% 
  plot_ly(x = ~order_dow, y = ~order_hour_of_day, type = 'box')

```
